shortcuts.name: Improve Text
shortcuts.prompt: Improve the writing quality and clarity of this text while maintaining its original meaning and tone.

shortcuts.name: Summarize
shortcuts.prompt: Provide a concise summary of this text, highlighting the main points.

shortcuts.name: Expand
shortcuts.prompt: Expand this text with more details, examples, and explanations while maintaining clarity.

shortcuts.name: Describe Screen
shortcuts.prompt: Describe what you see in this screenshot. Explain what is happening on the screen, what applications are open, what content is visible, and any notable elements or activities.

shortcuts.name: Analyze Screen (OpenAI)
shortcuts.prompt: Analyze this screenshot and provide detailed insights about what you see. Focus on technical aspects, UI elements, and actionable observations.

shortcuts.name: Fix Code
shortcuts.prompt: Review this code and fix any bugs, improve performance, or suggest better practices. Explain what you changed and why.
